translated: Meurling, Carl-Otto Axel, manager, captain, born on April 29, 1886 in Ekeby, Östergötland County, son of Colonel Carl Otto Sigvard Theodor M. and Selma Åhrberg. Married on 12th with Bertha Lundahl. Children: Sten, born in 1914, Ella 1916, Brita 1921. Has studied in Jönköping, obtained high school diploma in 1906, attended the Artillery and Engineering Higher School from 1912 to 1914, and the Royal Institute of Technology from 1915 onwards. Started as a second lieutenant in Wendes artillery regiment in 1908, became lieutenant in 1912, captain in 1923, and belonged to the reserve of the Field Artillery Corps from 1924. Chief assistant in 1920, manager and managing director of Norrköping Litho-graphic A-B since 1934. Member of the board of the Swedish Printing Association since 1934 and the Swedish Graphic Industry Association since 1942, chairman of the Östergötland Printing Association since 1934, Östergötland Savings Bank's local board member 1942 and central board member from 1946. Has had various commission assignments. Awarded with the Royal Order of the Sword, the Royal Victorian Order, and the Order of St. Olav of Norrköping city.

parents.name: Colonel Carl Otto Sigvard Theodor Meurling
